item.title: Hasbro Entertainment President Olivier Dumont Exits
item.description: Dumont moves on after a career that began at eOne, passing the Peppa Pig torch.

item.title: Live-Action ‘My Little Pony’ Movie in the Works From Amazon MGM and Hasbro
item.description: “My Little Pony” is getting ready to gallop on to the big screen in a live action feature from Amazon MGM Studios and Hasbro Entertainment, Variety has confirmed. Based on the popular toys
